opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class SignScorerInterpolation

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.SignScorerInterpolation
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class SignScorerInterpolation
extends Object
implements SignScorer, FeatureExtractor

Linear interpolation of sign scorers, some of which may be feature extractors.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $, $Date: 2011/01/15 17:52:59 $
Author:
Michael White

Constructor Detail

SignScorerInterpolation

public SignScorerInterpolation(SignScorer[] models)
Constructor with component models, which are given uniform weights.

SignScorerInterpolation

public SignScorerInterpolation(SignScorer[] models,
                               double[] weights)
Constructor with component models and weights. The weights are assumed to sum to 1, and the number of weights is assumed to match the number of models.

Method Detail

score

public double score(Sign sign,
                    boolean complete)
Returns a score between 0 (worst) and 1 (best) for the given sign and completeness flag, as the interpolation of the scores assigned by the component models. In particular, returns the linear combination using the established weights of the scores given by the component models.

Specified by:
score in interface SignScorer

public void setAlphabet(Alphabet alphabet)
Sets the alphabet for the component feature extractors.
